title: Jack and Jill

image.alt: Jack and Jill rolling down hill

text: Jack and Jill went up the hill. To fetch a pail of water. Jack fell down and broke his crown. And Jill came tumbling after.

title: Baa, baa, black sheep
text: Baa, baa, black sheep, Have you any wool? Yes, sir, yes, sir, Three bags full. One for the master, And one for the dame, And one for the little boy Who lives down the lane.

title: Hey Diddle Diddle
text: Hey diddle diddle, The cat and the fiddle, The cow jumped over the moon. The little dog laughed, To see such fun, And the dish ran away with the spoon.

title: This little piggy
text: This little piggy went to market, This little piggy stayed home, This little piggy had roast beef, This little piggy had none, And this little piggy went wee wee wee all the way home.

title: Birthday

image.alt: Cake with four blue candles, red icing and green base.

text: Happy Birthday to you, Happy Birthday to you. Happy Birthday Jessica
